sentences.sContent: You’ll have to join the queue.
Some of the people queuing for tickets had been there since dawn.
sentences.sCn: 购票队伍中有些人天刚亮就来了。

remMethod.val: q站在前面， 后面跟着ue ＋ ue， 真是一长队 → 长队

trans.tranOther: a line of people waiting to enter a building, buy something etc, or a line of vehicles waiting to move
to form or join a line of people or vehicles waiting to do something or go somewhere
